review: My computer is a few years old but this GPU has easily extended it's life for a couple of more years. The 3050 uses less power than it's other RTX siblings so it's perfect for older systems with smaller power supplies. I'm constantly amazed at how much better games look when I replay them on this new GPU. It's almost like having a new computer.
Make sure too download proper drivers for nvidia. Otherwise pair it with a intel 7 to prevent throttling.
not the highest priced video card but it is great for gaming and frame rates.  Works for other applications easy install and using simple HDMI cables to connect to monitor.
It's working fine quality of built is not there.
This card performs very good for a midrange offering.  I don't use this for gaming but in an engineering workstation setup.  Never have any issues.
its a great graphics card for entry level graphic design. This card is very quite and has worked well for me.

si son de Colombia super recomendado este y demás componentes comprados en la plataforma las tiendas físicas no bajan precios y se hacen de oro. súper recomendado armar un pc comprado por partes al menos hasta que bajen los precios de las cosas en las tiendas.
